name: AntonymScalia
0:
”Alexa ask antonym finder what is the opposite of fast”
”Alexa ask antonym finder what's the opposite of tired”
”Alexa ask antonym finder what is the antonym of happy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: antonym finder
des: Use Alexa to give you quick access to antonyms when you need them. Grow your vocabulary, impress your friends and neighbors and most of all sound like an English major.
